question: Many a times we read about Hot Money in newspapers. Which among the following options rightly describes hot money?
option1: Hot money is useful and generally durable and is good for the country in all weathers
option2: Hot money is dangerous and volatile and leaves the country in bad weather conditions
option3: Hot money is good and adds to the development of the country & it comes from exports of services
option4: Hot money is bad & useless as its arises from unusual activities like casinos, gambling, horse races, speculations etc.
answer: Hot money is dangerous and volatile and leaves the country in bad weather conditions
